metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation COMPRESS OBFUSCATION - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('text.encoding]::ascii')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.io.compression.deflatestream')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.io.streamreader'))) AND endswith(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('readtoend')))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
